content:
Hi :)
I'm new to inline assembly in general and rust's syntax specifically,
I want to translate some assembly code I have in a .s file to rust's inline assembly.
I assume there are no tools for that, are there any longer examples or more explanation other than what's in https://doc.rust-lang.org/beta/unstable-book/library-features/asm.html ?
If there's any guide that specifically maps between inline assembly and "regular" assembly that would be cool ;)

Thanks for all your hard work :D
